title: compute12 Maintenance
content:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we regularly perform maintenance work on our systems.

The maintenance work will take place on Thursday, 17.02.2022 at 10:00 (CET).

During this time, cloud servers on compute12 will be temporarily unavailable. Cloud Servers that are already off will be migrated first. Afterwards we will shutdown any cloud server's that are still running via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding
